description: The Gundam Fighter who represents the space colony of Neo Japan. Domon holds the title of colony martial arts champion, and his natural fighting abilities have been further honed through ten years of training under the legendary Master Asia, who chose him to inherit the title "King of Hearts." While his fighting skills are superb, Domon`s personality is brash and aggressive, and he has little concern for courtesy or chivalry. He nonetheless has a strong sense of justice, and will usually set aside his own mission when the weak and powerless require his protection.
name: Domon Kasshu
